reviews.text: Alpha Nine Zulu, this is Control Node.
reviews.reason_text: Just an identifier, not a requirement.

reviews.text: You are ordered to switch your primary data link to frequency shift keying modulation at 1200 baud on a 14 kHz carrier.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes specific behavior on the system.

reviews.text: In the event that no acknowledgment is received within five minutes, automatically revert to continuous wave transmission at ten words per minute.
After completion of the mode change, calculate and apply a new CRC-16 checksum to the node table and broadcast the updated checksum to all adjacent peers.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes an enforceable action on the system.

reviews.text: Effective immediately, upon receipt of this command, execute and log any errors to local memory in the return status report.
Confirm execution of all directives by return status message.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes a specific command confirmation requirement.
